slides.subtitle: Packing, lift-assisted loading and insurance managed by our in-house experts.

slides.title: House to House Moving
slides.subtitle: We plan every floor, elevator and parking detail before arriving at your address.

points.title: Warehouse Storage
points.body: Order tendering is an initial stage of the transportation process.

points.title: Security Cargo
points.body: While your freight is in transit, a 3PL tracks and manages it.

points.title: Easy Payment
points.body: After tendering the load, freight brokers will place your payment.

points.title: Fast Delivery
points.body: Carrier agrees to spot or drop trailers or vehicles swiftly.

items.label: EMPLOYEES IN TEAM
items.body: Skilled movers, planers and coordinators supporting you end-to-end.

items.label: KILOMETER TRAVEL WEEKLY
items.body: Long-haul and city routes operated with real-time tracking.

items.label: WORLDWIDE CLIENTS
items.body: From Berlin to the globe, brands rely on our logistics network.

items.label: PROJECTS DONE
items.body: Every relocation documented, insured and delivered on schedule.

services.title: House-to-House Moving
services.summary: We orchestrate every household move with insured packing crews, modular lifts and same-day arrival tracking.

services.title: Office & Workplace Relocation
services.summary: Cable labeling, server rack handling and after-hours workstation installation delivered by a single coordination team.

services.title: Pre-Move Survey
services.summary: On-site parking and lift checks, inventory capture, and transparent budgeting prepared within the same day.

services.title: Packing & Short-Term Storage
services.summary: Wardrobe boxes, dish packs and secure climate-friendly storage keep belongings pristine between addresses.

services.title: Warehouse Management
services.summary: Barcode-driven inventory control, cycle counts and customer-facing dashboards for complete visibility.

services.title: Rental Storage Space
services.summary: Flexible, temperature-regulated units with CCTV, access logging and custom insurance options.

services.title: Packing & Crating
services.summary: Custom crating, vacuum packing and export compliance for high-value or delicate equipment.

services.title: Inventory & Counting
services.summary: Periodic reconciliation, audit preparation and exceptions reporting directly from our WMS.

services.title: Project Logistics
services.summary: Turn-key coordination covering heavy lifts, plant shutdowns, route permits and on-site safety management.

services.title: Fair & Event Support
services.summary: Multi-stop deliveries, stand build teams and reverse logistics for roadshows, fairs and pop-up campaigns.

services.title: Dedicated Dispatch
services.summary: 24/7 control tower with live GPS feeds, driver scheduling and instant SLA notifications.

services.title: Field Supervision
services.summary: Multilingual supervisors handle loading oversight, photographic reports and customer sign-offs on site.

hero.title: See Our Story Through The Lens
hero.subtitle: Real moments from our moves, warehouses and crews.

hero.title: Moving Experience From Berlin To The World
hero.subtitle: Decades of relocation know-how, a modern fleet and multilingual coordinators let us manage every step for you.

who.title: Our Company Story
who.body: Lüks Berlin Nakliyat is an independent logistics squad delivering end-to-end solutions for city and intercity moves. From storage to project logistics and bespoke packing we stand next to individuals and brands alike, keeping every detail transparent from planning to delivery.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: Carry the quality standard we started in Berlin to every corner of Europe while offering trustworthy, fast and technology-backed moving experiences.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: Treat every relocation as our own story, exceed expectations with tailored solutions and stay reachable with expert teams at all times.

operationalSafety.title: Operational Safety
operationalSafety.description: Our fleet and crews deliver the same quality on every transfer.

onTime.title: On-Time Delivery
onTime.description: We guarantee loading and handover at the agreed times.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Certified, experienced specialists are ready for every scenario.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: We craft unique solutions and keep you informed throughout the journey.

smartTracking.title: Smart Tracking
smartTracking.description: Live monitoring, reporting and IoT sensors keep each process transparent.

storageAssurance.title: Storage Assurance
storageAssurance.description: 24/7 security, climate-controlled warehouses and insured packing.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Route optimisation helps us reduce our carbon footprint every day.

support247.title: Support 24/7
support247.description: Our operations hub is reachable at any hour.

contactPage.infoLead: We answer every question before the project starts and keep you in touch with the same crew whenever you need us.
contactPage.formLead: Fill the form and, when you hit send, we will receive your message on WhatsApp instantly.
contactPage.ctaTitle: Call us or visit our office to get the best transfer experience
contactPage.whatsappDefault: Hello, I would like to get information.

testimonials.text: They wrapped every piece carefully and arrived exactly on time. Communication was excellent and the whole process felt effortless.
testimonials.name: Ahmet T.

testimonials.text: Our office relocation finished faster than planned. The crew stayed solution oriented the entire time; we highly recommend them.
testimonials.name: Merve K.

cta.title: Request a call back
cta.subtitle: For the fastest response call us, drop a WhatsApp message or send an email whenever you prefer.

footer.description: Reliable, on-time and insured moving support for Berlin and all of Germany. Professional solutions for homes, offices and partial loads.
